QuestData.Title: Terror of the Kraul
QuestData.Description: By all the gods of the sea, what a monster!$b$bI can barely believe what I am seeing, $n. This ettin has undergone the same ritual that the brutes do, and it seems even angrier! If he gets out of here, we won't stand a chance.$b$bI know I ask the impossible, but I must: kill this monstrosity and save the whole valley from its wrath! Here, take one of the potion samples you brought me. It's probably dangerous, but you might need it to defeat this beast.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Stop him before it's too late!
QuestData.CompletionText: We have to kill that thing!
QuestData.RewardText: It's done! I was afraid you were done for, but you've saved us all!
